#summary How to compile tim2view in Lazarus.

= Lazarus Compilation Instruction =

  # Launch target OS (for which you want to compile *tim2view*);
  # Download and install *[http://www.lazarus.freepascal.org/ Lazarus]*;
  # *[http://code.google.com/p/tim2view/source/checkout Checkout SVN]* to download last source version;
  # Open *tim2view.lpi* in Lazarus;
  # Click *Run -> Build* to make tim2view.
